Summary: Saw white cigar shaped object. It split in two. saw light flash on one
divs: sighting detailsabout 6:35pm while driving on rt 95 s\128s in burlington,ma, on sept 21 2010.i saw what i first thought was a contrail with a steep incline, or a strange white cloud. have no idea of distance. it was not breaking up ,stayed the same size and same location. was able to take 3 photos on iphone. then i saw the middle of this thing vanish. now there were 2 objects.i saw a quick flash of light from the end of one object, seemed white, only one flash. with the naked eye it looked like a cloud, no structure to it. at this point it was out of my sight. it was west of my location, the moon was on my left object on my right. upon zooming in on the photos you could see yellow round things surounding the cigar shaped object, this was before it broke into two parts. they apeared to be attached to the object. the sighting lasted about 3 minutes.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Burlington
There were no other sightings in Burlington on or around September 21st 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
